00028 static dfsch_object_t* urldecode_to_string(char* buf, size_t len){
00029   dfsch_strbuf_t sb;
00030   sb.ptr = buf;
00031   sb.len = len;
00032   return dfsch_make_string_nocopy(dfsch_inet_urldecode(&sb));
00033 }
00034 
00035 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_http_split_path(char* path){
00036   char* pos;
00037   dfsch_object_t* head;
00038   dfsch_object_t* tail;
00039   dfsch_object_t* tmp;
00040   
00041   head = tail = NULL;
00042 
00043   while (1){
00044     while (*path == '/'){
00045       path++;
00046     }
00047 
00048     if (*path == 0){
00049         tmp = dfsch_cons(NULL, NULL);      
00050         if (tail){
00051           dfsch_set_cdr(tail, tmp);
00052           tail = tmp;
00053         } else {
00054           head = tail = tmp;
00055         }
00056         break;
00057     } else {
00058 
00059       pos = strchr(path, '/');
00060       if (!pos){
00061         tmp = dfsch_cons(urldecode_to_string(path, strlen(path)), NULL);
00062 
00063         if (tail){
00064           dfsch_set_cdr(tail, tmp);
00065           tail = tmp;
00066         } else {
00067           head = tail = tmp;
00068         }
00069         break;
00070       } else {
00071         tmp = dfsch_cons(urldecode_to_string(path, pos - path), NULL);
00072         path = pos;
00073 
00074         if (tail){
00075           dfsch_set_cdr(tail, tmp);
00076           tail = tmp;
00077         } else {
00078           head = tail = tmp;
00079         }
00080 
00081       }
00082     }
00083   }
00084 
00085   return head;
00086 
00087 }

00089 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_http_query_2_hash(char* query){
00090   size_t delim;
00091   char* value;
00092   dfsch_object_t* hash;
00093 
00094   hash = dfsch_hash_make(DFSCH_HASH_EQUAL);
00095 
00096   while (*query){
00097     query += strspn(query, "&;");
00098     delim = strcspn(query, "&;");
00099     
00100     value = memchr(query, '=', delim);
00101     if (value){
00102       value++;
00103       dfsch_hash_set(hash, 
00104                      urldecode_to_string(query, value-query-1),
00105                      urldecode_to_string(value, (query+delim) - value));
00106     } else {
00107       dfsch_hash_set(hash, 
00108                      urldecode_to_string(query, delim),
00109                      NULL);
00110     }
00111 
00112     query += delim;
00113   }
00114 
00115   return hash;
00116 }
00117 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_http_query_2_alist(char* query){
00118   size_t delim;
00119   char* value;
00120   dfsch_object_t* tmp;
00121   dfsch_object_t* head = NULL;
00122   dfsch_object_t* tail;
00123 
00124   while (*query){
00125     query += strspn(query, "&;");
00126     delim = strcspn(query, "&;");
00127     
00128     value = memchr(query, '=', delim);
00129     if (value){
00130       value++;
00131       tmp = dfsch_cons(dfsch_list(2, 
00132                                   urldecode_to_string(query, 
00133                                                       value - query - 1),
00134                                   urldecode_to_string(value, 
00135                                                       (query+delim) - value)),
00136                        NULL);
00137     } else {
00138       tmp = dfsch_cons(dfsch_list(1, 
00139                                   urldecode_to_string(query, delim)),
00140                        NULL);
00141     }
00142 
00143     if (head){
00144       dfsch_set_cdr(tail, tmp);
00145       tail = tmp;
00146     } else {
00147       head = tail = tmp;
00148     }
00149 
00150     query += delim;
00151   }
00152 
00153   return head;
00154 }

00156 static int xdigit_to_num(char digit){
00157   switch(digit){
00158   case '0':
00159     return 0;
00160   case '1':
00161     return 1;
00162   case '2':
00163     return 2;
00164   case '3':
00165     return 3;
00166   case '4':
00167     return 4;
00168   case '5':
00169     return 5;
00170   case '6':
00171     return 6;
00172   case '7':
00173     return 7;
00174   case '8':
00175     return 8;
00176   case '9':
00177     return 9;
00178   case 'A':
00179   case 'a':
00180     return 10;
00181   case 'B':
00182   case 'b':
00183     return 11;
00184   case 'C':
00185   case 'c':
00186     return 12;
00187   case 'D':
00188   case 'd':
00189     return 13;
00190   case 'E':
00191   case 'e':
00192     return 14;
00193   case 'F':
00194   case 'f':
00195     return 15;
00196   default:
00197     return 255;
00198   }
00199 }

00201 dfsch_strbuf_t* dfsch_inet_urldecode(dfsch_strbuf_t* strbuf){
00202   dfsch_strbuf_t* res = GC_NEW(dfsch_strbuf_t);
00203   size_t i;
00204   char* out;
00205 
00206   res->len = 0;
00207   i = 0;
00208   while (i < strbuf->len){
00209     if (strbuf->ptr[i] == '%'){
00210       i++;
00211       res->len++;
00212       if (i < strbuf->len && isxdigit(strbuf->ptr[i])){
00213         i++;
00214         if (i < strbuf->len && isxdigit(strbuf->ptr[i])){
00215           i++;
00216         } else {
00217           i--;
00218         }
00219       }
00220     } else {
00221       res->len++;
00222       i++;
00223     }
00224   }
00225 
00226   res->ptr = out = GC_MALLOC_ATOMIC(res->len+1);
00227   i = 0;
00228   while (i < strbuf->len){
00229     if (strbuf->ptr[i] == '%'){
00230       i++;
00231       if (i < strbuf->len && isxdigit(strbuf->ptr[i])){
00232         *out = xdigit_to_num(strbuf->ptr[i]) << 4;
00233         i++;
00234         if (i < strbuf->len && isxdigit(strbuf->ptr[i])){
00235           *out |= xdigit_to_num(strbuf->ptr[i]);
00236           i++;
00237           out++;
00238         } else {
00239           i--;
00240         }
00241       } else {
00242         *out++ = '%'; 
00243       }
00244     } else if (strbuf->ptr[i] == '+'){
00245       i++;
00246       *out++ = ' ';      
00247     } else {
00248       *out++ = strbuf->ptr[i++];
00249     }    
00250   }
00251 
00252   *out = 0;
00253 
00254   return res;
00255 }

00257 static char hex_digits[] = "0123456789abcdef";
00258 
00259 dfsch_strbuf_t* dfsch_inet_urlencode(dfsch_strbuf_t* strbuf){
00260   dfsch_strbuf_t* res = GC_NEW(dfsch_strbuf_t);
00261   size_t i;
00262   char* out;
00263 
00264   i = 0;
00265   while (i < strbuf->len){
00266     if (isalpha(strbuf->ptr[i]) ||
00267         isdigit(strbuf->ptr[i]) ||
00268         strchr("-_.~", strbuf->ptr[i])){
00269       res->len++;
00270       i++;
00271     } else if (strbuf->ptr[i] == ' ') {
00272       res->len++;
00273       i++;
00274     } else {
00275       res->len+=3;
00276       i++;      
00277     }
00278   }
00279 
00280   res->ptr = out = GC_MALLOC_ATOMIC(res->len + 1);
00281 
00282   i = 0;
00283   while (i < strbuf->len){
00284     if (isalpha(strbuf->ptr[i]) ||
00285         isdigit(strbuf->ptr[i]) ||
00286         strchr("-_.~", strbuf->ptr[i])){
00287       *out++ = strbuf->ptr[i++];
00288     } else if (strbuf->ptr[i] == ' ') {
00289       *out++ = '+';
00290       i++;
00291     }else {
00292       *out++ = '%';
00293       *out++ = hex_digits[((unsigned char)strbuf->ptr[i]) >> 4];
00294       *out++ = hex_digits[strbuf->ptr[i] & 0xf];
00295       i++;      
00296     }
00297   }
00298   
00299   return res;
00300 }
00301 
00302 static char base64_chars[] = 
00303   "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789+/";
00304 static int base64char_value(char ch){
00305   if ((ch >= 'A') && (ch <= 'Z')){
00306     return ch - 'A';
00307   } else if ((ch >= 'a') && (ch <= 'z')){
00308     return ch - 'a' + 26;
00309   } else if ((ch >= '0') && (ch <= '9')){
00310     return ch - '0' + 52;
00311   } else if (ch == '+'){
00312     return 62;
00313   } else if (ch == '/'){
00314     return 63;
00315   }
00316   return -1;
00317 }
00318 static char ubase64_chars[] = 
00319   "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789.-";
00320 static int ubase64char_value(char ch){
00321   if ((ch >= 'A') && (ch <= 'Z')){
00322     return ch - 'A';
00323   } else if ((ch >= 'a') && (ch <= 'z')){
00324     return ch - 'a' + 26;
00325   } else if ((ch >= '0') && (ch <= '9')){
00326     return ch - '0' + 52;
00327   } else if (ch == '.'){
00328     return 62;
00329   } else if (ch == '-'){
00330     return 63;
00331   }
00332   return -1;
00333 }

00335 dfsch_strbuf_t* dfsch_inet_base64_decode(dfsch_strbuf_t* str_buf){
00336   dfsch_strbuf_t* res = GC_NEW(dfsch_strbuf_t);
00337   size_t i;
00338   size_t valid;
00339   uint32_t tmp;
00340   int val;
00341   char* out;
00342 
00343   valid = 0;
00344 
00345   for (i = 0; i < str_buf->len; i++){
00346     if (base64char_value(str_buf->ptr[i]) >= 0){
00347       valid++;
00348     } 
00349   }
00350   
00351   switch (valid % 4){
00352   case 0:
00353   case 1:
00354     res->len = valid / 4 * 3;
00355     break;
00356   case 2:
00357     res->len = valid / 4 * 3 + 1;    
00358     break;
00359   case 3:
00360     res->len = valid / 4 * 3 + 2;    
00361     break;
00362   }
00363 
00364   tmp = 0;
00365   valid = 0;
00366   res->ptr = out = GC_MALLOC_ATOMIC(res->len+1);
00367 
00368   for (i = 0; i < str_buf->len; i++){
00369     val = base64char_value(str_buf->ptr[i]);
00370     if (val >= 0){
00371       tmp <<= 6; 
00372       tmp |= val;
00373       valid++;
00374       if (valid == 4){
00375         valid = 0;
00376         *out++ = (tmp >> 16) & 0xff;
00377         *out++ = (tmp >> 8) & 0xff;
00378         *out++ = (tmp) & 0xff;
00379         tmp = 0;
00380       }
00381     }
00382   }
00383 
00384   switch (valid){
00385   case 2:
00386     tmp <<= 12;
00387     *out++ = (tmp >> 16) & 0xff;
00388   case 3:
00389     tmp <<= 6;
00390     *out++ = (tmp >> 16) & 0xff;
00391     *out++ = (tmp >> 8) & 0xff;
00392   }
00393 
00394   *out = 0;
00395 
00396   return res;
00397 }
00398 dfsch_strbuf_t* dfsch_inet_base64_encode(dfsch_strbuf_t* str_buf,
00399                                          int wrap,
00400                                          int pad){
00401   dfsch_strbuf_t* res = GC_NEW(dfsch_strbuf_t);
00402   size_t i;
00403   char* out;
00404   uint32_t tmp;
00405 
00406   switch (str_buf->len % 3){
00407   case 0:
00408     res->len = str_buf->len / 3 * 4;
00409     break;
00410   case 1:
00411     res->len = str_buf->len / 3 * 4 + (pad ? 4 : 2);
00412     break;
00413   case 2:
00414     res->len = str_buf->len / 3 * 4 + (pad ? 4 : 3);
00415     break;
00416   }
00417   
00418   if (wrap){
00419     res->len += (res->len / 64) * 2;
00420   }
00421 
00422   res->ptr = out = GC_MALLOC_ATOMIC(res->len+1);
00423   
00424   for (i = 0; i + 2 < str_buf->len;  i+=3){
00425     tmp = ((((unsigned)str_buf->ptr[i]) & 0xff) << 16) | 
00426       ((((unsigned)str_buf->ptr[i+1]) & 0xff) << 8) | 
00427       (((unsigned)str_buf->ptr[i+2]) & 0xff);
00428 
00429     *out++ = base64_chars[(tmp >> 18) & 0x3f];
00430     *out++ = base64_chars[(tmp >> 12) & 0x3f];
00431     *out++ = base64_chars[(tmp >> 6) & 0x3f];
00432     *out++ = base64_chars[tmp & 0x3f];
00433 
00434     if (wrap && i % 48 == 45){
00435       *out++ = '\r';
00436       *out++ = '\n';      
00437     }
00438   }
00439 
00440   switch (str_buf->len - i){
00441   case 1:
00442     tmp = ((((unsigned)str_buf->ptr[i]) & 0xff) << 16);
00443 
00444     *out++ = base64_chars[(tmp >> 18) & 0x3f];
00445     *out++ = base64_chars[(tmp >> 12) & 0x3f];
00446     if (pad){
00447       *out++ = '=';
00448       *out++ = '=';
00449     }
00450     break;
00451   case 2:
00452     tmp = ((((unsigned)str_buf->ptr[i]) & 0xff) << 16) | 
00453       ((((unsigned)str_buf->ptr[i+1]) & 0xff)<< 8);
00454 
00455     *out++ = base64_chars[(tmp >> 18) & 0x3f];
00456     *out++ = base64_chars[(tmp >> 12) & 0x3f];
00457     *out++ = base64_chars[(tmp >> 6) & 0x3f];
00458     if (pad){
00459       *out++ = '=';
00460     }    
00461     break;
00462   }
00463   
00464   *out = 0;
00465 
00466   return res;
00467 }
00468 dfsch_strbuf_t* dfsch_inet_uri_base64_decode(dfsch_strbuf_t* str_buf){
00469   dfsch_strbuf_t* res = GC_NEW(dfsch_strbuf_t);
00470   size_t i;
00471   size_t valid;
00472   uint32_t tmp;
00473   int val;
00474   char* out;
00475 
00476   valid = 0;
00477 
00478   for (i = 0; i < str_buf->len; i++){
00479     if (ubase64char_value(str_buf->ptr[i]) >= 0){
00480       valid++;
00481     } 
00482   }
00483   
00484   switch (valid % 4){
00485   case 0:
00486   case 1:
00487     res->len = valid / 4 * 3;
00488     break;
00489   case 2:
00490     res->len = valid / 4 * 3 + 1;    
00491     break;
00492   case 3:
00493     res->len = valid / 4 * 3 + 2;    
00494     break;
00495   }
00496 
00497   tmp = 0;
00498   valid = 0;
00499 
00500   res->ptr = out = GC_MALLOC_ATOMIC(res->len+1);
00501 
00502   for (i = 0; i < str_buf->len; i++){
00503     val = ubase64char_value(str_buf->ptr[i]);
00504     if (val >= 0){
00505       tmp <<= 6; 
00506       tmp |= val;
00507       valid++;
00508       if (valid == 4){
00509         valid = 0;
00510         *out++ = (tmp >> 16) & 0xff;
00511         *out++ = (tmp >> 8) & 0xff;
00512         *out++ = (tmp) & 0xff;
00513       }
00514     }
00515   }
00516 
00517   switch (valid){
00518   case 2:
00519     tmp <<= 12;
00520     *out++ = (tmp >> 16) & 0xff;
00521   case 3:
00522     tmp <<= 6;
00523     *out++ = (tmp >> 16) & 0xff;
00524     *out++ = (tmp >> 8) & 0xff;
00525   }
00526 
00527   *out = 0;
00528 
00529   return res;
00530 }
00531 dfsch_strbuf_t* dfsch_inet_uri_base64_encode(dfsch_strbuf_t* str_buf){
00532   dfsch_strbuf_t* res = GC_NEW(dfsch_strbuf_t);
00533   size_t i;
00534   char* out;
00535   uint32_t tmp;
00536 
00537   switch (str_buf->len % 3){
00538   case 0:
00539     res->len = str_buf->len / 3 * 4;
00540     break;
00541   case 1:
00542     res->len = str_buf->len / 3 * 4 + 2;
00543     break;
00544   case 2:
00545     res->len = str_buf->len / 3 * 4 + 3;
00546     break;
00547   }
00548   
00549   res->ptr = out = GC_MALLOC_ATOMIC(res->len+1);
00550   
00551   for (i = 0; i + 2 < str_buf->len;  i+=3){
00552     tmp = ((((unsigned)str_buf->ptr[i]) & 0xff) << 16) | 
00553       ((((unsigned)str_buf->ptr[i+1]) & 0xff) << 8) | 
00554       (((unsigned)str_buf->ptr[i+2]) & 0xff);
00555 
00556     *out++ = ubase64_chars[(tmp >> 18) & 0x3f];
00557     *out++ = ubase64_chars[(tmp >> 12) & 0x3f];
00558     *out++ = ubase64_chars[(tmp >> 6) & 0x3f];
00559     *out++ = ubase64_chars[tmp & 0x3f];
00560   }
00561 
00562   switch (str_buf->len - i){
00563   case 1:
00564     tmp = (((unsigned)str_buf->ptr[i]) << 16) & 0xff;
00565 
00566     *out++ = ubase64_chars[(tmp >> 18) & 0x3f];
00567     *out++ = ubase64_chars[(tmp >> 12) & 0x3f];
00568     break;
00569   case 2:
00570     tmp = ((((unsigned)str_buf->ptr[i]) & 0xff) << 16) | 
00571       ((((unsigned)str_buf->ptr[i+1]) & 0xff) << 8);
00572 
00573     *out++ = ubase64_chars[(tmp >> 18) & 0x3f];
00574     *out++ = ubase64_chars[(tmp >> 12) & 0x3f];
00575     *out++ = ubase64_chars[(tmp >> 6) & 0x3f];
00576     break;
00577   }
00578   
00579   *out = 0;
00580 
00581   return res;
00582 }

00584 char* dfsch_inet_xml_escape(char* str){
00585   char* res;
00586   size_t len;
00587   size_t i;
00588   char* out;
00589 
00590   len = 0;
00591 
00592   for (i = 0; str[i]; i++){
00593     switch (str[i]){
00594     case '<':
00595     case '>':
00596       len += 4;
00597       break;
00598     case '\"':
00599     case '\'':
00600       len += 6;
00601       break;
00602     case '&':
00603       len += 5;
00604       break;
00605     default:
00606       len++;
00607     }
00608   }
00609 
00610   res = out = GC_MALLOC_ATOMIC(len + 1);
00611 
00612   for (i = 0; str[i]; i++){
00613     switch (str[i]){
00614     case '<':
00615       *out++ = '&';
00616       *out++ = 'l';
00617       *out++ = 't';
00618       *out++ = ';';
00619       break;
00620     case '>':
00621       *out++ = '&';
00622       *out++ = 'g';
00623       *out++ = 't';
00624       *out++ = ';';
00625       break;
00626     case '\"':
00627       *out++ = '&';
00628       *out++ = 'q';
00629       *out++ = 'u';
00630       *out++ = 'o';
00631       *out++ = 't';
00632       *out++ = ';';
00633       break;
00634     case '\'':
00635       *out++ = '&';
00636       *out++ = 'a';
00637       *out++ = 'p';
00638       *out++ = 'o';
00639       *out++ = 's';
00640       *out++ = ';';
00641       break;
00642     case '&':
00643       *out++ = '&';
00644       *out++ = 'a';
00645       *out++ = 'm';
00646       *out++ = 'p';
00647       *out++ = ';';
00648       break;
00649     default:
00650       *out++ = str[i];
00651     }
00652   }
00653 
00654   *out = 0;
00655 
00656   return res;
00657 }
